body_html:
I don't think so, because BLAS usually supports both rowMajor and columMajor data internally.
We could make contiguous only if specific cases (zero stride), like it's done in addmm
body_text:
I don't think so, because BLAS usually supports both rowMajor and columMajor data internally.
We could make contiguous only if specific cases (zero stride), like it's done in addmm
body:
I don't think so, because BLAS usually supports both rowMajor and columMajor data internally.
We could make contiguous only if specific cases (zero stride), like it's done in [`addmm`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorMathBlas.cu#L267-L275)
